text: Ira Jeffrey Glass77 Milestone. Baltimore, Maryland: Milford Mill High School. 1977 (; born March 3, 1959) is an American public radio personality. He is the host and producer of the radio and television show This American Life. He also appeared in Morning Edition, All Things Considered, and Talk of the Nation. He was born in Baltimore, Maryland. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website * * Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:American atheists Category:American movie producers Category:American Jews Category:American radio personalities Category:American television presenters Category:Writers from Baltimore
title: Ira Glass
